channel.title: Roadmaps on Malice Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Roadmaps on Malice Docs

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: Quo vadis? The port of the original Material theme has replicated nearly all of its features. A few are still missing but I’ve good news: the Hugo community is actively working on this issues. Maybe with the next release of Hugo we can abandon this list. Stay tuned. Localization Currently, it is possible to collect all strings in a single place for easy customization. However, this only enables you to define all strings in a single language.
